sentence.Network_en: It describes the sorrow and plaintive emotion of the ancient lady - in - waiting.
sentence.Network_cn: 此曲表现了古代宫女哀怨悲愁的情绪及寂寥清冷的生命意境.

sentence.Network_en: I usually compare myself to ancient king, and the books on the shelf to lady - in - waiting .
sentence.Network_cn: 关于这些,我常自比为古时的皇帝, 而把插在架上的书譬诸列屋而居的 宫女.

sentence.Network_en: Lady in - waiting says to antique dealer: Lord, tonight 3 more come my room.
sentence.Network_cn: 侍女对古董商说: 老爷, 今夜三更来我室.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ... . . .她27岁来到西班牙，由于画技出众受雇于西班牙王室成为宫廷画家。1559年她出席了伊丽莎白的结婚庆典，不久便受命以侍女（lady-in-waiting）身份担任王后的绘画教师。安奎索拉的付出得到了回报，法国驻西班牙大使在给王后凯瑟琳的信中称赞伊丽莎白的.

Zhaojun Tomb is the tomb of Zhaojun , a Han Dynasty palace lady-in-waiting who became the consort of a Xiongnu ruler .昭君墓是汉代宫女王昭君的陵墓。王昭君后来成为匈奴单于的妃子。
ladies-in-waiting侍从女官 sisters-in-law嫂子,弟媳 wards of court法庭指定受监护者 3 首字母缩写词也可有复数形式: MPs(Members of Parliament)英国下院议员.

entry.tran: （女王、王后或公主的）女侍臣，宫女
entry.def: A lady-in-waiting is a woman whose job is to help a queen or princess.

means.word_mean: 1. a lady appointed to attend to a queen or princess
